snippet: The Supreme Court will hear arguments next Tuesday in a lawsuit challenging limits to the overall amount a person can contribute to all federal candidates in an election cycle.
abstract: Supreme Court will hear arguments in case challenging limits to overall amount an individual can contribute to all federal candidates in an election cycle; critics say challenge, filed by engineering company head Shaun McCutcheon, has potential to destroy what is left of federal campaign finance regulations after Citizens United decision, which struck down limits on independent campaign spending by corporations and unions.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court will hear arguments next Tuesday in a lawsuit challenging limits to the overall amount a person can contribute to all federal candidates in an election cycle.
